```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
encounters_raw <- read_xlsx("data/encounter history.xlsx", na = "NULL")
people_raw <- read_xlsx("data/FHPMatchedtoEMRMatchedtoChante_reduced.xlsx", na = "NULL")
visits_raw <- read.csv("data/AllVisitsStroger2020toPresent.csv")
deaths_raw <- read_xlsx("data/MatchingtoMEdata.xlsx")
diagnoses_raw <- read_xlsx("data/Rectified_FHSP_CC_20201102.xlsx")
```

```{r}
people <- people_raw %>%
    # 86576 rows
    distinct() %>%
    # 44346 rows
    select(
        person_id, cmrn_id, rin_cc, NAME_FIRST, NAME_LAST, BIRTH_DT_TM, sex_cd, race, ethnicity
    ) %>%
    distinct()
    # 4768 rows
```
